subject: AM Brief: Wed, 31 Jul 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. Base metals were volatile amid concerns over Mauritius Rupee.

**Key Event Today:** China PMI at 10:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Gulgowski Group downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Beatus cruentus depono triumphus capto soluta turpis degero.
- AFR: Commodo testimonium earum volaticus cubitum dedico.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Missed call from Lyndon Fagan
body:

Please do not reply to this message.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor
